descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6]SORRY for my poor English,
<br/>[/size]
<br/>this MOD modle a new blade armor to the Skyrim,
<br/><br/>I really like  [size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/84409/?]Ark's Rogue Blade Armor[/url][/size]
<br/>(his blade Cuirass quite lorely to Oblivion-edition，but the ironpants look a little odd i think...)[quote][/quote]
<br/>
<br/>[u][size=4]Contains[/size][/u]
<br/><br/>[size=2]new dragonscale-pants  armor,(Retextures more lore-friendly) 
<br/><br/>a dragon-skin-frontarm Sleeve 
<br/><br/>(it will NOT overwrite your Gauntlets position，you can wear them both！)
<br/><br/>a  new iron-gloves to this MOD.
<br/><br/>
<br/><br/>[/size]
<br/><br/>[size=4]For now[/size],I [size=3]ONLY WORK the [u]MALE version[/u][/size]，sorry for Female Character，maybe some time  I will finish it.[quote][/quote]
<br/><br/>
<br/><br/>[size=6]HOPE YOU LIKE IT!![/size][/center]
<br/><br/>
author: KnightBBpig
